infos.value: ...Well, well. I'm impressed. Not a single soul left alive.
I see. I thought something was strange.
There was a sweet scent mixed in with the blood on your clothes.
It all makes sense now. This Saiga man is your lover, and you two were meeting in secret.
I cannot let you return to the village.
Ha ha ha ha ha! How cute! I might just die laughing.
Can you imagine how famous I would be for slaughtering the chiefs of both Saiga and Gouga?
...So what's say we have ourselves a little fun?
